Directions: In a mixing bowl, beat bananas, sugar, eggs, oil and vanilla.  Combine the dry ingredients; stir into banana mixture.  Fold in chocolate chips and nuts.  Pour into two greased 8-in. x 4-in. x 2-in. loaf pans.  Bake at 350 degrees F for 55 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.  Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pans to wire racks.
